conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with clear isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and interior volume; minor perspective softening at the edges.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is highly accurate; some minor wall thickness inconsistencies and simplified door openings.

interior_elements.notes: Bathroom fixtures and kitchen counters are well-placed; dining and living sets align with plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, though some 'ghosting' artifacts appear around the perimeter walls.

detected_errors.description: Outer wall geometry at the top-right contains some non-manifold/overlapping mesh artifacts.
Some internal door swings/openings are represented as solid gaps without frames.

summary: A highly faithful 3D conversion that accurately translates complex room adjacencies and furniture layout from the source blueprint.
